oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Centennial commemorative paper
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Commemorative Murfreesboro News created especially for the Civil War Centennial, given a date of July 13, 1862. It includes engravings of Col. Nathan Bedford Forrest, Jefferson Davis, and General Robert E. Lee, and photographs of "Six Gallant Leaders" from Rutherford County: Brigadier Generals B. McCulloch, H. McCulloch, Barksdale, Featherstone, Palmer and Smith. The reverse side is a copy of the New York Herald which has map "General Rosecrans' Battle Around Murfreesboro."
